overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a well-rounded social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers and a diverse range of content focused on research, computational social science, and disinformation. Engagement levels are notably high, particularly on LinkedIn and Bluesky.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research findings, publications, and tool updates.
Announcements regarding job openings and research opportunities.
Updates about conferences and upcoming presentations.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on Bluesky and Mastodon to match LinkedIn's engagement levels.
Incorporate more visual content to enhance engagement across all platforms.

platformInsights.mastodon: While Mastodon has fewer followers, engagement per post is strong, suggesting a dedicated audience.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, particularly for content related to research grants and job opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
